name: Youmbrella
author: Rafael Castelli

sections.description:
Youmbrella adds protection to youtube embedded videos making them available only to your subscribers.

Use Youmbrella to generate leads, grow your email list and build your social media through youtube videos.

Here is what Youmbrella can do for you:

• Make youtube videos available to subscribers only

• Create landing pages with videos to subscribers only

• Create playlist with videos to subscribers only

• Generate list of emails from who played the videos

Youmbrella App
Youmbrella is a standalone application that integrates with WordPress. You must have an account with Youmbrella in order to take advantage of this plugin. Click here to create your account.

See more at Youmbrella.com.

Requirements: PHP5.6+, WordPress 4.0.x+

Important Links:

  • Youmbrella.com
sections.installation:
1. Install the Youmbrella plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Paste your Youmbrella Key from Youmbrella.com into the text area and click save!
sections.faq:
The best place for getting your questions answered is our Support Area.

Where do I get the Youmbrella key for this plugin?

You can get your own Hello Bar account from HelloBar.com for free.
Once you have your account, create a bar or popup at HelloBar.com and then you’ll receive a small piece of code called a site snippet that you can copy and paste into this widget.

short_description: Easily add Youmbrella to your WordPress blog with the official Youmbrella for WordPress plugin.
